en: Jaja, kau buat apa di asrama lelaki?

en: Hei, kau buat apa di asrama lelaki?

en: Dia tiada. Dia dah balik kampung.
vi: He's not here. He went back home.

en: Dia ada di asrama kami tadi.
vi: She was in our dorm just now.

en: Dia buat apa di asrama lelaki?
vi: What's she doing in the boy's dorm?

en: Dia cari Aizat, tapi Aizat dah balik kampung.
vi: She was looking for Aizat, but he went back home.

en: Sekejap, Aizat balik kampung? Bukan dia tak balik kampung?
vi: Wait, Aizat went home? I thought he didn't go home much.

en: Ya, tapi dia akan balik untuk hari jadinya setiap tahun.
vi: Yes, but he will go home for his birthday every year.

en: Tentu dia takut terkena tepung. Nak lindungi sangat rambut dia.

I thought you were looking for Jaja.

en: Dia tanya jam berapa bas Aizat akan bertolak.
vi: She asked what time Aizat's bus would leave.
Do you know who did this?

en: Saya tak tahu, cikgu. Tapi saya akan cuba siasat.
vi: I don't know, sir, but I will try to find out.

en: Mak kau menunggu, bukan? Jom. Barang kau berat.
vi: Your mom is waiting, right? Come on. These are really heavy.
Hurry up, we don't have time!
-Aizat. Excuse me, sir. -What? Where's your ticket?

en: Ini semua barang kau yang aku kutip selama ini.
vi: These are all your stuff that I picked up all this while.
take good care of my sister.

en: Kalau kau cari masalah dengan dia, siaplah.
vi: If you mess with her, you're dead.
Labis! Hurry up, we're running late!
This is correct. Get in, miss.

en: - Labis. Abang, saya cari adik saya. - Ya?
vi: Labis. Sir, I'm looking for my sister.
I don't have time for this. Mat, let's go!
Hey, Jat. Have you seen Jaja?

en: - Abang, tunggu sekejap! - Aku nak pergi ke banyak tempat.
vi: -Sir, wait a second! -I have many more trips to make.

en: Awang, boleh aku bercakap dengan kau?
vi:
Peace be upon you too.
 Awang, can I talk to you?

en: Aku tak nak cakap melalui telefon.
vi: We can't talk about it on the phone.

en: Jumpa malam ini di pejabat kau, boleh?
vi: I'll see you tonight at your office, okay?

en: Kenapa kau tak suruh pemandu berhenti?
vi: Why didn't you ask the driver to stop?

en: - Aku dah suruh, tapi dia tak nak dengar. - Apa? Kenapa kau tak cuba lagi?
vi: -I did, but he won't listen. -What? Why didn't you try again?

en: Kamu berdua cuba malukan dan menyusahkan aku hari ini?
vi: Are you sisters trying to humiliate me, to trouble me today?

en: Tunggu. Kau tak marah aku lagi?
vi: Wait. Are you not mad at me anymore?

en: Aku tak tahu apa yang merasuk aku.
vi: I don't know what has gotten into me.

en: Tak apalah, aku yang patut minta maaf.
vi: No, I'm the one who should be sorry.

en: Kita berdua bodoh dan minta maaf.
vi: Both of us are stupid, both of us are sorry.

en: Tapi kenapa kau cari Aizat di stesen bas?
vi: But why did you look for Aizat at the bus station?

en: Tak, aku cuma nak pulangkan barang dia.
vi: No, I was just returning his stuff.

en: Aku rasa aku tak nak hadapinya lagi.
vi: I feel like I don't want to face that anymore.

en: Kau? Kau buat apa di sana?
vi: You? What were you doing there?

en: Aku cari kau. Kau sedang merajuk.
vi: I was looking for you. You were mad at me.
So you really love me, don't you?

en: Di hentian seterusnya, aku beli tiket balik, okey?
vi: At the next stop, I'll buy a ticket back home, okay?

en: - Okey. Selamat tinggal. - Selamat tinggal, Ja.
Kau tahu ini bas ekspres, bukan?
vi: You know this is an express bus, right?

en: Bas ini tiada perhentian. Kau hanya boleh ke tandas.
vi: This bus doesn't have stops. You only get bathroom breaks.

en: Jadi bas ini nak ke mana?
vi: So where is this bus going?

LABIS BUS STATION
 There's just one last bus at twelve o'clock.

en: Aku tunggu di sini dengan kau.
Rumah ibu kau jauh dari sini?
vi: Is your mom's place far from here?

en: Kita kena melalui sawah padi dan kereta tak boleh lalu.
vi: You have to go through a paddy field and cars can't get through.

en: Kalau rumah ibu kau berdekatan, aku ingat…
vi: Well, if your mom's place is nearby, I would like to--

STIA LEADING IN SBP TRIAL EXAMS
 Din, coffee.

en: Aku tak sangka kau boleh gertak pelajar kau untuk berubah secepat ini.

due to STIA's tradition of excellence.

en: Macam mana kau boleh dapat nama panggilan "Botol"?
vi: How did you get the nickname "Botol"?

en: semua orang cakap badan aku pelik.
vi: everyone said my body was weird.
is a lot smaller than my body.

en: Kau tak marah mereka panggil kau begitu?
vi: Aren't you mad they called you that?

en: Aku dah lewat, aku nak balik.
vi: I'm late, I have to go.

en: Kalau semua orang balik, aku pun kena balik?
vi: If everyone is going home, do I have to go back too?
You didn't reply to my texts.

en: sampai pergi ke hentian untuk pastikan kamu tak apa-apa.
vi: so I went to the station to make sure you're all right.

en: Ibu teringat kisah tujuh tahun lalu.

en: Kenapa kamu bawa balik anak orang?

en: Kamu nak tanggung kalau ada apa-apa terjadi?
vi: Will you be responsible if anything happens?
-Aizat, are you listening to me? -Yes, Mom. I'm listening, sorry.

en: Mak cik dan anak mak cik…
Botol, boleh aku tanya satu soalan?
vi: Botol, can I ask you a question?

en: Macam mana kau boleh jadi macam ini?
vi: How did you become like this?
You're not like the other kids.
You look like you're so calm.
It's like you have no troubles.

en: Mana ada orang yang tiada masalah di dunia ini.
vi: Who could have no troubles in this world?

en: Habis itu, macam mana kau boleh kekal tenang?
vi: Then how can you be so calm all the time?

en: Jadi kau rasa tenang sebab kau tak rasa kau istimewa, bukan?
vi: So you feel calm because you don't think that you're special, right?

en: Aku tak begitu pandai, tapi aku selalu lulus Fizik.
vi: I'm not that smart, but I always score Physics.

vi: -What does Physics have to do with it? -Okay, it's like this.

en: Aku bukan saja belajar SPM Fizik.
vi: I don't just study SPM Physics.
How the planets orbit around the sun,

en: macam mana kita ada berbilion-bilion galaksi.
vi: how we have billions of galaxies.
And when I study these things,
Smaller than a speck of dust.

en: Apabila aku sedar aku cuma habuk yang tak bernilai,
vi: When I realize that I'm just an insignificant speck,
become just a speck of dust.
that I have no troubles, no burdens.

en: Tapi apabila aku sedar masalah aku kecil,
vi: But when I realize that my troubles are small,

en: buang masa saja untuk memikirkannya lama-lama.
vi: it's a waste of time to dwell upon them.

en: Lebih baik aku berdiam diri dan hadapinya.
vi: I'd rather be quiet and face it.

en: kau tak rasa ada seorang pun di dunia ini yang rasa kau penting?
vi: there's even one person in this world who thinks that you matter?

en: Kau tak rasa kau akan jumpa seseorang lebih istimewa berbanding orang lain?
vi: Don't you think that you'll find someone special compared to others?

en: Kau tak rasa sunyi hidup sebegitu?
vi: Don't you feel lonely living like that?

en: Entahlah, Botol. Fikiran aku serabut sekarang.
vi: I don't know, Botol. My mind is reeling right now.

en: Aku tak tahu apa yang aku cakap. Ayuh, jom.
vi: I don't know what I'm saying. Come on, let's go.

en: Sudah lama abang tak balik. Cepat, mari sini!

You've all gotten so big. I haven't been back for a while.
 Quick, come here!

-Do you miss me? -Yes.
 How come you got darker?

Dia sesuai dengan kakak sebab kakak cantik.
vi: He'd be perfect for you because you're pretty.
What a sweet talker. What's your name again?

en: Jom. Siapa nak masuk? Abang akan beri kamu makan malam!
vi: Who wants to go inside? I'll feed you guys dinner!

en: - Jom, siapa nak? Angkat tangan! - Saya!

vi: All of the children came from there.

en: Ibu, saya minta maaf. Saya tak tahu.
vi: Mom, I'm sorry. I didn't know.
Why do you have to be sorry?
Aizat chose to keep it a secret.

en: Saya tak rasa kawan-kawan dia di sekolah tahu.

en: Tak sangka dulu dia muat untuk masuk di situ.

This room used to be hers.
But ever since he was young,

Aizat, this is not the way

Kita kena tunjuk dengan usaha kita.

en: Ibu sendiri tak pernah rasa begitu

He didn't even return to his room.

en: Dia belajar sepanjang malam tanpa tidur.

en: Keputusan PMR dia cemerlang dan dia ditawarkan
vi: Her PMR results were excellent and she was offered

en: masuk sekolah berasrama elit di Kuala Lumpur.

But she couldn't bear to go

en: Setiap tahun, pada hari jadi Aizat,
Yati mesti buat kek batik untuk dia.

en: Mesti kamu tak selesa, berpeluh sepanjang hari.
vi: You must be uncomfortable from a long day.

en: Nanti ibu minta Aizat hantar kamu ke hentian.
vi: I'll ask Aizat to send you to the station.

en: Apa terjadi dengan arwah Kak Yati?
vi: What happened to the late Yati?

en: Pada pagi hari jadi Aizat tahun itu,
vi: On the morning of Aizat's birthday that year,

en: Malam itu, dia langsung tak tidur.
vi: She didn't sleep at all the night before.
You're leaving for school so early.

en: Aizat, kita kena jadi contoh kepada adik-adik yang lain.
vi: Aizat, we have to become role models for the younger kids.

vi: You have to do well in your UPSR exam.
I have to do well in SPM.

en: Hari inilah hari yang kita kena tunjuk kepada semua…
vi: This is the day for us to show everyone

vi: that it doesn't matter where we come from, Aizat.
What's important is our next direction.
These will determine where we're going.

She swerved onto the main road.

en: Kereta di belakang tak sempat berhenti.
vi: The oncoming car couldn't brake in time.

Terima kasih kerana benarkan saya tumpang mandi di sini.
vi: Thank you very much for letting me stay here for a while.

vi: Are you sure you don't want to stay here until Sunday?

en: Saya rasa Aizat tak selesa kalau saya duduk lama-lama di sini, ibu.
vi: I don't think Aizat will like it if I stay here longer, Mom.

Tell him it was my idea.

en: Saya tak rasa dia nak bercakap dengan saya sekarang.

en: Sudah lama dia mengelak daripada bercakap tentang ini.

en: Ibu rasa dia sendiri pun tak sedar
vi: I think even he doesn't realize

en: untuk mengurangkan beban yang dia galas selama ini.

en: Aku tahu jalan ke hentian bas.
vi: I know how to get to the station.
Okay, I'll see you at school then.

en: Kau tahu aku langsung tak kisah tentang ini, bukan?
vi: You do know that I don't mind this, right?
I don't mind this at all.

en: Aku juga rasa kawan-kawan kau dan seluruh tingkatan tak kisah.
vi: And I don't think your friends and our batchmates would mind.
We know who you are, Jat.

en: Bukan setakat siapa yang kau tunjuk kepada kami.
vi: You're not just the person you showed to us.

en: Kapten ragbi sekolah yang berlagak dan rasa dia pemilik sekolah.

en: Tapi kami kenal kau sebagai orang baik dan sayang kawan-kawannya.

en: Ibu dah banyak cerita tentang kau,

I just want you to know

en: kau tak perlu galas beban ini seorang diri.
vi: that you don't have to carry the weight of the world on your own.
Call me if you need anything.

Kau ziarah dia pada hari ini setiap tahun?
vi: Do you visit her on this day every year?

nobody knew where I came from,

vi: I loved it when nobody knew.

en: Buat kali pertama dalam hidup aku,
vi: For the first time in my life,

vi: I could do everything that I wanted.

en: Aku boleh jadi apa saja yang aku nak di sekolah.
vi: I could be anything I wanted to be at school.

en: Aku suka apabila semua orang seronok berkawan dengan aku.
vi: I love that people like being my friend.

en: Ada yang sanjung aku, ada yang memuja aku.

en: Aku terlalu suka sampai terlupa janji aku kepada Kak Yati.

en: Aku fikir SPM saja yang boleh buang
vi: I think only SPM can redeem
every damned thing that life threw at me.

kau tak perlu galas beban itu seorang diri.

In the play of your thoughts Everything is confusing
